Question: What are the attributes of the Version node for the Software named 'Apache' which depends on a Service that runs on OS version 'Linux/5.4'?
Cypher:
MATCH (software:Software {name:"Apache"})-[dependsOnService:DEPENDS_ON]->(service:Service)
MATCH (service)-[runsOnOS:RUNS]->(os:OS)-[osVersionRel:VERSION]->(version:Version {name: "Linux/5.4"})
MATCH (software)-[softwareVersionRel:VERSION]->(versionSoftware:Version)
RETURN software, dependsOnService, service, runsOnOS, os, osVersionRel, version, softwareVersionRel, versionSoftware, versionSoftware.name

Question: For a Router in Zone 55, list the Interface attributes that connect to a Network with an IP '192.168.1.1'.
Cypher:
MATCH (router:Router {zone:55})-[routes_to_interface:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)
MATCH (interface)-[connects:CONNECTS]->(network:Network {ip:"192.168.1.1"})
RETURN router, routes_to_interface, interface, connects, network, interface.ip
Rewrite: List the attributes of the Interface for a Router in Zone 55 that connects to a Network with the IP '192.168.1.1'.

Question: Identify and list the attributes of all Processes that run on a Machine in DataCenter 'DC-West' which contains Router 'Router-09'.
Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter {name:"DC-West"})-[:CONTAINS]->(router:Router {name:"Router-09"})
MATCH (data_center)-[:CONTAINS]->(rack:Rack)-[:HOLDS]->(machine:Machine)-[:RUNS]->(process:Process)
RETURN data_center, router, rack, machine, process, process.name, process.startTime, process.pid
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (data_center:DataCenter {name:"DC-West"})-[relation5:CONTAINS]->(router:Router {name:"Router-09"})
MATCH (data_center)-[relation6:CONTAINS]->(rack:Rack)-[relation7:HOLDS]->(machine:Machine)-[relation8:RUNS]->(process:Process)
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, data_center, router, rack, machine, process, process.name, process.startTime, process.pid
Rewrite: Enumerate the characteristics of every Process operating on a Machine located in DataCenter 'DC-West' that includes Router 'Router-09'.

Question: Provide details for all Versions that are instances of OS 'Ubuntu 20.04' that runs Applications having dependencies on Process 'Proc9001'.
Cypher:
MATCH (os:OS {name:"Ubuntu 20.04"})-[os_instance:INSTANCE]->(version:Version)
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[machine_runs_os:RUNS]->(os)
MATCH (machine)-[machine_runs_app:RUNS]->(application:Application)-[app_instance:INSTANCE]->(version)
MATCH (application)-[app_dependency:DEPENDS_ON]->(process:Process {name:"Proc9001"})
RETURN os, os_instance, version, machine, machine_runs_os, machine_runs_app, application, app_instance, app_dependency, process
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (operating_system:OS {name:"Ubuntu 20.04"})-[instance_relation:INSTANCE]->(version:Version)
MATCH (operating_system)-[relation5:RUNS]->(application:Application)-[relation6:DEPENDS_ON]->(process:Process {name:"Proc9001"})
RETURN relation6, relation5, operating_system, instance_relation, version, application, process
Rewrite: Supply information for every Version that is an instance of OS 'Ubuntu 20.04' and operates Applications that rely on Process 'Proc9001'.

Question: Show details of the Type node linked to Machines, which run an OS having a dependency on an Application named 'NginxServer'.
Cypher:
MATCH (application:Application {name:"NginxServer"})<-[application_dependency:DEPENDS_ON]-(os:OS)-[os_runs:RUNS]->(machine:Machine)-[machine_type:TYPE]->(type:Type)
RETURN os, application_dependency, application, os_runs, machine, machine_type, type, type.name, type.disk, type.cpu, type.id, type.type, type.ram

Question: Retrieve properties of Ports that are exposed by Interfaces in the same Network zone as Zone 'Z102' which also route to Egress 'Eg101'.
Cypher:
MATCH (selectedZone:Zone {zone: 'Z102'})-[:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)-[:EXPOSES]->(port:Port)
MATCH (egress:Egress {name: 'Eg101'})-[:ROUTES]->(interface)-[:CONNECTS]->(network:Network)
WHERE network.zone = selectedZone.zone
RETURN selectedZone, interface, port, egress, network, port.port
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (selectedZone:Zone {zone: 'Z102'})-[relation5:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)-[relation6:EXPOSES]->(port:Port)
MATCH (egress:Egress {name: 'Eg101'})-[relation7:ROUTES]->(interface)-[relation8:CONNECTS]->(network:Network)
WHERE network.zone = selectedZone.zone
RETURN relation8, relation7, relation6, relation5, selectedZone, interface, port, egress, network, port.port
Rewrite: Obtain attributes of Ports exposed by Interfaces within the same Network zone as Zone 'Z102' and which route to Egress 'Eg101'.

Question: What are the attributes of the relations between 'Router' nodes and 'Interface' nodes where the Router's zone is '10' and it connects via ROUTES relation to Interfaces having IP '10.1.1.1'?
Rewrite: What characteristics define the connections between 'Router' nodes and 'Interface' nodes when the Router's zone equals '10' and it links through a ROUTES relation to Interfaces with an IP of '10.1.1.1'?

Question: List all relation attributes for VERSION relations from Services named 'WebServer' which also have an INSTANCE relation with Applications named 'WebPortal'.
Cypher:
MATCH (service:Service {name:"WebServer"})-[version_relation:VERSION]->(version:Version)
MATCH (service)-[:INSTANCE]->(application:Application {name:"WebPortal"})
RETURN service, version_relation, version, application
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (service:Service {name:"WebServer"})-[version_relation:VERSION]->(version:Version)
MATCH (service)-[relation4:INSTANCE]->(application:Application {name:"WebPortal"})
RETURN relation4, service, version_relation, version, application
Rewrite: Retrieve all attribute details of VERSION relations for Services called 'WebServer' that additionally possess an INSTANCE relation with Applications called 'WebPortal'.

Question: Can you provide details of 'DEPENDS_ON' relations for Software 'DatabaseServer' connected to Versions depended on by Applications used by Process 'Proc2002'?
Cypher:
MATCH (software:Software {name:"DatabaseServer"})-[softwareDepends:DEPENDS_ON]->(version:Version)
MATCH (application:Application)-[appDepends:DEPENDS_ON]->(version)
MATCH (process:Process {name:"Proc2002"})-[procDepends:DEPENDS_ON]->(application)
RETURN software, softwareDepends, version, appDepends, application, procDepends, process
Rewrite: Can you supply information about the 'DEPENDS_ON' relationships for the Software 'DatabaseServer' linked to Versions that Applications rely on, which are utilized by the Process 'Proc2002'?

Question: Expose the relations connected from Egress 'Eg45' to Interfaces, and further to Port '4045' through the EXPOSES relation.
Cypher:
MATCH (egress:Egress {name:"Eg45"})-[routesTo:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)-[exposesTo:EXPOSES]->(port:Port {port:4045})
RETURN egress, routesTo, interface, exposesTo, port
Rewrite: Reveal the connections from Egress 'Eg45' to Interfaces, and onward to Port '4045' via the EXPOSES relation.

Question: Provide all details of the RUNS relations affecting Machines in DataCenter 'MainStorage' running Services with PID '30001'.
Cypher:
MATCH (dataCenter:DataCenter {name:"MainStorage"})-[:CONTAINS]->(machine:Machine)-[runsRelation:RUNS]->(service:Service {pid:30001})
RETURN machine, runsRelation, service, service.name, service.versions, service.ports, service.dependencies, service.startTime, service.pid
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (dataCenter:DataCenter {name:"MainStorage"})-[relation3:CONTAINS]->(machine:Machine)-[runsRelation:RUNS]->(service:Service {pid:30001})
RETURN relation3, dataCenter, machine, runsRelation, service, service.name, service.versions, service.ports, service.dependencies, service.startTime, service.pid

Question: What are the relations between Applications named 'DataAnalytics' via INSTANCE to Services, and the latter's INSTANCES to Versions?
Cypher:
MATCH (application:Application {name:"DataAnalytics"})-[instanceAppToService:INSTANCE]->(service:Service)-[instanceServiceToVersion:INSTANCE]->(version:Version)
RETURN application, instanceAppToService, service, instanceServiceToVersion, version, application.name, service.name, version.name
Rewrite: What are the connections between 'DataAnalytics' Applications through INSTANCE to Services, and the connections of these Services' INSTANCES to Versions?

Question: What is the average 'disk' size of the Type nodes for the Machines that run Services named 'HTTPServer'?
Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[:RUNS]->(service:Service {name: "HTTPServer"})
MATCH (machine)-[:TYPE]->(type:Type)
RETURN AVG(type.disk) AS averageDiskSize
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[relation3:RUNS]->(service:Service {name: "HTTPServer"})
MATCH (machine)-[relation4:TYPE]->(type:Type)
RETURN AVG(type.disk) AS averageDiskSize
Rewrite: What is the typical size of the 'disk' for Type nodes in Machines operating Services called 'HTTPServer'?

Question: Calculate the average start time of all Processes that depend on Software named 'SQLServer' which in turn depends on Applications named 'DataWarehousing'.
Cypher:
MATCH (process:Process)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(software:Software)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(application:Application)
WHERE software.name = 'SQLServer' AND application.name = 'DataWarehousing'
RETURN AVG(process.startTime) AS averageStartTime
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (process:Process)-[relation3:DEPENDS_ON]->(software:Software)-[relation4:DEPENDS_ON]->(application:Application)
WHERE software.name = 'SQLServer' AND application.name = 'DataWarehousing'
RETURN AVG(process.startTime) AS averageStartTime
Rewrite: Determine the mean start time of all Processes reliant on a Software called 'SQLServer', itself dependent on Applications known as 'DataWarehousing'.

Question: Count the total number of Ports that are listened by Services with a dependency on Software named 'Firewall'. The said Services must also have versions including '1.2.0'.
Cypher:
MATCH (service:Service)-[:LISTENS]->(port:Port),
      (service)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(software:Software),
      (service)-[:VERSION]->(version:Version)
WHERE software.name = "Firewall" AND "1.2.0" IN service.versions
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT port)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (service:Service)-[relation4:LISTENS]->(port:Port),
      (service)-[relation5:DEPENDS_ON]->(software:Software),
      (service)-[relation6:VERSION]->(version:Version)
WHERE software.name = "Firewall" AND "1.2.0" IN service.versions
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT port)
Rewrite: Calculate the total number of Ports that are being listened to by Services dependent on Software called 'Firewall' and also include versions '1.2.0'.

Question: Find the maximum ram size from Types where the Machines host an OS that runs Processes depending on an Application called 'FileServer'.
Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[:RUNS]->(os:OS)-[:RUNS]->(process:Process)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(application:Application {name: "FileServer"})
MATCH (machine)-[:TYPE]->(type:Type)
RETURN MAX(type.ram) AS maxRam
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (machine:Machine)-[relation5:RUNS]->(os:OS)-[relation6:RUNS]->(process:Process)-[relation7:DEPENDS_ON]->(application:Application {name: "FileServer"})
MATCH (machine)-[relation8:TYPE]->(type:Type)
RETURN MAX(type.ram) AS maxRam

Question: Determine the minimum PID in Processes that are 'INSTANCE' of Applications running under OS 'Ubuntu 18.04' in Machines held on Rack 'R10'.
Rewrite: Find the smallest PID among Processes that are 'INSTANCE' of Applications operating on OS 'Ubuntu 18.04' within Machines located in Rack 'R10'.

Question: What is the total number of Interfaces that route to Zones where Router 'Rt55' is connected and Machine 'Mach77' runs?
Cypher:
MATCH (router:Router {name: "Rt55"})-[:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)<-[:ROUTES]-(zone:Zone),
      (machine:Machine {name: "Mach77"})-[:ROUTES]->(interface)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT interface) AS totalInterfaces
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (router:Router {name: "Rt55"})-[relation4:ROUTES]->(interface:Interface)<-[relation5:ROUTES]-(zone:Zone),
      (machine:Machine {name: "Mach77"})-[relation6:ROUTES]->(interface)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT interface) AS totalInterfaces
Rewrite: How many Interfaces lead to Zones connected to Router 'Rt55' and host Machine 'Mach77'?
